extension.description: You can add any custom metadata here when you extend cw721-base

animation_url.description: A URL to any multi-media attachments

attributes.description: The metadata of the token (if it exists)

display_type.description: The string used to display the attribute, if none is provided the `key` field can be used

description.description: An optional description of the token

external_url.description: A URL to the token's source

publisher.description: The original publisher of the token

youtube_url.description: A URL to a related YouTube videos

extension.title: Extension

token_uri.description: Universal resource identifier for this NFT Should point to a JSON file that conforms to the CW721 Metadata JSON Schema
token_uri.title: Token uri
